description:
After 50 years Kan-chan`s grandchild http://anidb.net/ch109575 [Yodayama Kantarou] meets http://anidb.net/ch109570 [Akubi] as she goes on a journey to prepare to be queen. In the human world, Kantarou and Akubi go on various adventures, get jobs, and learn the importance of having dreams.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
Princess Akubi, daughter of King Genie, has her job cut out for her. She must begin her royal training in the human world to help elementary school student Kantaro find his dream. Only, he’s not impressed by magic or Akubi’s well-intentioned efforts.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Demashite Kimashite Akubi Desu! no Hanashi
Presto, Bammo, It`s Akubi!
出まして 来まして アクビです! の話

REGULAR.description:
It’s pandemonium in the human world when Akubi’s little brother is released from the magic bottle by an unsuspecting and gassy Kan. But getting the adorable mischief-maker to disappear is a lot harder than eating a couple of sweet potatoes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Onara no Puuta, Ooabare! no Hanashi
Prince Farty Let`s It Rip!
おならのプゥータ, 大暴れ! の話

REGULAR.description:
Magic and modern tech collide as Akubi’s fascination with smart phones grows. The real chaos begins when Kan’s friend Mario becomes smitten with Akubi’s grown-up disguise. Soon, eye-popping revelations and self-realizations ensue.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Love Is in the Air... From the Vase
Tsubo no Naka kara Ahahanhan! no Hanashi
壺の中からアハハンハン! の話

REGULAR.description:
Kan’s parents meet Akubi and become fast friends, entrusting the genie with breaking the grade-schooler’s slacker streak. Kan’s embarrassment takes off the moment Akubi has the bright idea to visit the airport transformed as adult cabin attendants.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Accident, Please!
Accident, Please! no Hanashi
アクシデント, プリーズ! の話

REGULAR.description:
Kan is destined for social media stardom! Or at least that’s what Akubi has in mind. To guide Kan toward his dream, Akubi can think of nothing better than posting videos to T-Tube. Also on T-Tube, to everyone’s surprise, is a King Genie lookalike.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dai Maou ga Futari!? no Hanashi
Double Trouble!
大魔王が二人!? の話

REGULAR.description:
Kan has been duped by his mom into attending open idol auditions, but it is Akubi and mother dearest who catch the eye of the head recruiter. Kan is then quickly roped into supporting the darling newbie and the lovable blast from the past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mama wa Idol! no Hanashi
Mom Is an Idol!
ママはアイドル! の話

REGULAR.description:
Life takes on a tinge of mayhem when Kan and Akubi get stuck with a needy set of triplets. Then the new weary-eyed guardians come up with a new bright idea: drop the infants off, along with Akubi’s kid bro, at the new A.I.-equipped daycare center.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Preschool for Little Bro!
Puuta o Hoikuen ni Irete Mita! no Hanashi
プゥータを保育園に入れてみた! の話

REGULAR.description:
Ninjas, genies, and a kidnapping, oh my! With his friends and Akubi, Kan reluctantly visits a new ninja theme park on invitation from his wealthy classmate Kaneamari. Surprises soon strike: Kan is recruited for a ninja show, then someone disappears.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ninja vs Mahou Tsukai! no Hanashi
Ninja vs. Genie
忍者vs魔法使い! の話

REGULAR.description:
Akubi’s mini-internships are wearing thin on loafer Kan. To salvage his free time, Kan glues the magic bottle shut only to accidently summon Akubi’s little brother who shatters the mysterious object to pieces. Can they save the bottle and Akubi?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mahou no Tsubo ga Warechatta! no Hanashi
Oh No, the Magic Bottle Broke!
魔法の壺が割れちゃった! の話

REGULAR.description:
When Kaneamari shows Akubi a smartphone video of the famous dog trainer he plans on hiring to train his bulldog, Akubi’s excitement soars. Before Kan knows it, he is donning a collar and having his furry derriere sniffed by a very stubborn bulldog.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kan Turns into a Dog!
Kan-chan, Inu ni Naru! no Hanashi
カンちゃん, 犬になる! の話

REGULAR.description:
The Yotayamas treat Akubi and family to conveyor-belt sushi, but are soon kicked out and at the doorstep of a traditional sushi bar, thanks to Little Bro. When Akubi and Kan learn business is down, they decide to intervene with a trip to the Amazon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pirarucu? What`s That? Does It Taste Good?
Pirarukuu? Nani Sore? Oishii no? no Hanashi
ピラルクー? 何それ? おいしいの? の話

REGULAR.description:
The fireworks festival is about to begin, and love is in the air. Mario has fallen for “Akemi,” straining his friendship with Kan. To confess his love, Mario decides to craft his own firework display with the help of his uncle, the pyrotechnician.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dream Date at the Fireworks Festival
Risou no Hanabi Date! no Hanashi
理想の花火デート! の話

REGULAR.description:
Amenity-rich luxury and good old-fashioned roughing it collide when the gang’s latest excursion takes them into the wild open wilderness. Kaneamari shows off by “glamping,” swaying some, but Kan and Mario decide to impress Akubi another way.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kane ka Idea ka!? Camp no Tatsujin! no Hanashi
Money or Ideas? The Camping Expert!
カネかアイデアか!? キャンプの達人! の話

REGULAR.description:
Kan’s grandpa, Kanichi, is back in Japan for a family vacation, and King Genie and Akubi couldn’t be more surprised. The Kanichi they knew fifty years ago has changed completely, prompting tears of joy from King Genie and unexpected changes in Kan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ganso Kan-chan ga Kaette Kita! no Hanashi
The Original Kan Is Back!
元祖カンちゃんが帰ってきた! の話

REGULAR.description:
Things get surreal with the appearance of King Genie who screams emergency. Kan and Akubi are then swallowed up by a strange void before being transported to an animation studio of all places. They better get to work—their survival depends on it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Anime kara Tobidashita!? no Hanashi
It Jumped out of an Anime!?
アニメから飛び出した!? の話

REGULAR.description:
The elementary school tradition of spiritual cultivation at the temple is underway, and Kan is oddly into it. Meditation and standing under a freezing cold waterfall are all part of the agenda, but nothing compares to what awaits the gang at nightfall.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Different Things Scare Different People
Kowai Monotte Hito Sorezore! no Hanashi
怖いものって人それぞれ! の話

REGULAR.description:
Kaneamari is panicked and desperate for Kan and Akubi’s help after ruining his dad’s golf club. Enter cult anime figure Moonlight Phantom Thief. With a little imagination and magic, all seems solved, until a certain self-described detective shows up.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dai Goutei Settou Jiken: Kaiketsu Hen! no Hanashi
Robbery at the Mansion. Solving the Case!
大豪邸窃盗事件 解決編! の話

REGULAR.description:
Pâtisserie has a romantic ring to it, at least according to Akubi, who decides to try her hand at baking with Kan. Surprisingly Kan’s cake impresses, leading him to make a special delivery to a special someone. Prince Farty, however, has other plans.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cake Shop Kan
Cake-ya Kan-chan! no Hanashi
ケーキ屋カンちゃん! の話

REGULAR.description:
King Genie reports Kan has finally discovered his dream, but Akubi is pulled into the human world before she can hear what it is. While Akubi is about to burst with excitement, Kan is dreaming about winning the railway photo contest he just found.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Dream Finally Found!
Yume o Mitsuketa! no Hanashi
夢をみつけた! の話

REGULAR.description:
Akubi receives completely shocking news from King Genie, which sends Kan into a tailspin too. On their last mini internship together, Kan and Akubi venture into new territory, and the revelations fly.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sayonara, Akubi! no Hanashi
So Long, Akubi!
さよなら, アクビ! の話
Opening 1a
Opening 1b
Ending 1
Ending 2
Hakushon Daimaou 2020
Genie Family 2020
ハクション大魔王2020
噴嚏大魔王 2020
Hakushon Daimaou Season 2
